languages.text: "Похоже, понятие "юмор" не входит в словарный запас слуг Императора. Но "правда" — должна. Видите ли, тот губернатор — подделка, фальшивка, не стоящая слез. Истинный губернатор Тассеры — перед вами, господа".

traits.locale_text: "Похоже, понятие "юмор" не входит в словарный запас слуг Императора. Но "правда" должна. Видите ли, тот губернатор — подделка, фальшивка, не стоящая слез. Истинный губернатор Тассеры — перед вами, господа".
traits.speaker: FW_TrueGovernor_Buffoon

languages.text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."
languages.original_text: "Похоже, понятие "юмор" не входит в словарный запас слуг Императора. Но "правда" — должна. Видите ли, тот губернатор — подделка, фальшивка, не стоящая слез. Истинный губернатор Тассеры — перед вами, господа".

traits.locale_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

"It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

languages.text: “看来，帝皇仆人的字典里没有‘幽默’这个词，但他们的字典里至少应该有‘真相’这个词。如你们所见，那个总督是个骗子，是个冒牌货，根本不值得哀悼。尊贵的客人们啊，塔瑟拉真正的总督，就站在你们面前。”
languages.original_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

traits.locale_text: “看来，帝皇仆人的字典里没有‘幽默’这个词，但他们的字典里至少应该有‘真相’这个词。如你们所见，那个总督是个骗子，是个冒牌货，根本不值得哀悼。尊贵的客人们啊，塔瑟拉真正的总督，就站在你们面前。”

languages.text: «Por lo visto el "sentido del humor" no está en el vocabulario de los siervos del Emperador. Espero que la palabra "verdad" lo esté. Ese gobernador no era más que un farsante, un testaferro; nadie va a llorar su pérdida. El verdadero gobernador de Thassera, estimados invitados, se encuentra aquí mismo frente a ustedes».
languages.original_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

traits.locale_text: «Por lo visto el "sentido del humor" no está en el vocabulario de los siervos del Emperador. Espero que la palabra "verdad" lo esté. Ese gobernador no era más que un farsante, un testaferro; nadie va a llorar su pérdida. El verdadero gobernador de Thassera, estimados invitados, se encuentra aquí mismo frente a ustedes».

languages.text: "Görünüşe göre 'mizah', İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının kelime dağarcığında yok. 'Gerçek' ise elbet vardır. Görüldüğü üzere o vali sahtekârdı, taklitçiydi. Ağlamaya değmezdi. Thassera'nın gerçek valisi karşınızda duruyor saygıdeğer misafirler."
languages.original_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

traits.locale_text: "Görünüşe göre 'mizah', İmparator'un hizmetkârlarının kelime dağarcığında yok. 'Gerçek' ise elbet vardır. Görüldüğü üzere o vali sahtekârdı, taklitçiydi. Ağlamaya değmezdi. Thassera'nın gerçek valisi karşınızda duruyor saygıdeğer misafirler."

languages.text: 「『ユーモア』という単語は、皇帝の使用人の辞書には載ってないらしい。しかし、『真実』という単語はあるはずだ。わかるだろう、あの総督はペテン師で、偽者だ。泣きわめく価値もない。タッセーラの真の総督はお前の前に立っているんだよ、お客人」
languages.original_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

traits.locale_text: 「『ユーモア』という単語は、皇帝の使用人の辞書には載ってないらしい。しかし、『真実』という単語はあるはずだ。わかるだろう、あの総督はペテン師で、偽者だ。泣きわめく価値もない。タッセーラの真の総督はお前の前に立っているんだよ、お客人」

languages.text: « L'humour ne fait visiblement pas partie du vocabulaire des serviteurs de l'Empereur, mais ce devrait être le cas de la vérité. Ce gouverneur ne mérite pas que vous versiez une larme pour lui ; c'était un imposteur. Le véritable gouverneur de Thassera se tient devant vous, très honorables invités. »
languages.original_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

traits.locale_text: « L'humour ne fait visiblement pas partie du vocabulaire des serviteurs de l'Empereur, mais ce devrait être le cas de la vérité. Ce gouverneur ne mérite pas que vous versiez une larme pour lui ; c'était un imposteur. Le véritable gouverneur de Thassera se tient devant vous, très honorables invités. »

languages.text: "Das Wort 'Humor' existiert im Wortschatz der Diener des Imperators offenbar nicht. 'Wahrheit' sollte es hingegen. Wisst Ihr, dieser Gouverneur war ein Betrüger, ein Hochstapler. Er ist keine Träne wert. Der wahre Gouverneur von Thassera steht vor Euch, verehrte Gäste."
languages.original_text: "It seems 'humour' is not part of the vocabulary of the Emperor's servants. But 'truth' should be. You see, that governor was a fraud, a fake — not worth crying over. The true governor of Thassera stands before you, esteemed guests."

traits.locale_text: "Das Wort 'Humor' existiert im Wortschatz der Diener des Imperators offenbar nicht. 'Wahrheit' sollte es hingegen. Wisst Ihr, dieser Gouverneur war ein Betrüger, ein Hochstapler. Er ist keine Träne wert. Der wahre Gouverneur von Thassera steht vor Euch, verehrte Gäste."
